name: Duplicade
description:
Very basic and simple platformer puzzle. You have the ability to make copies of yourself.

Reach to the flag in to advance to next level!

Control:

  • LEFT & RIGHT to move
  • UP to jump
  • DOWN to make copy
  • R to reset level
  • Q to reset the whole progress

I made this game as an entry from Trijam #206. The them is "Just another copy".

UPDATED: I updated a final level that worth it. The new one requires more puzzle solving skill rather than jumping skill
